title: Beachfront Mauritius Marine Park Bliss with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Snorkelling Excursion
description:
The line between a wellness retreat and an adventure playground blurs at this stunning oceanfront oasis on the postcard-perfect coastline of Le Chaland Beach. Connect with the pristine Mauritian landscape on energetic hikes through the lush on-land trails or by diving deep - snorkel in tow - into the azure waters of Blue Bay Marine Park.

Back at the tropical resort, you're spoilt for choice with a range of dining options. Savour seafood grilled to perfection at Sea.Fire.Salt, indulge in Mauritian delicacies, or stone-baked pizza as you please. When drinks are in order, enjoy a refreshing poolside cocktail at Aqua Pool's swim-up bar, or descend to the resort's wine cellar, 1884, for a rare tipple.

Immerse yourself in traditional Mauritian culture on a tour through a nearby tea plantation, or a rum distillery tasting experience, before returning to utterly relax during a Thai-inspired massage at the blissful Anantara Spa.
offer_address: Blue Bay Marine Park, Le Chaland, Plaine Magnien 51510, Mauritius
